short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is the required extension for use with the EkkoReader web app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to access the EkkoReader web app. The extension allows you to see what people around you are reading (anonymously).
